1.  'On played' Jokers (Green Joker, etc.)
2.  Played cards score (Scholar chips/mult triggers here)

4.  'Independent' Jokers (Shoot the Moon Holo edition +10 Mult, other +mult jokers)

The Standard Pack is $4. I have $8. With $8, I get to move to the next round with $9 and another chance at a better hand. So, my best move is to save money and accumulate interest.
